Encounters:

12 Feb 2015 - 19 Feb 2015Admission - Leeds General Infirmary - Dr Matt Smith
Medical consultation on hospital inpatient
Patients swallowing considered unsafe and on the advice of SALT team non oral feeding initiated.
Diagnosis: Cerebrovascular accident
Investigation/s: Computed tomography scan - whole body. Electrocardiographic monitoring
Observation/s: Blood pressure - Systolic blood pressure 107mmHg Diastolic blood pressure 60mmHg
Prescription/s: Aspirin 75mg e/c tablet
Procedure/s: Percutaneous Endoscopic Gastrostomy (PEG) inserted.
01 Jan 2015GP Clinic - Wood Town GP Practice - Dr Tom Wood
Consultation
Procedure/s: Nail bed procedure performed
11 Dec 2014Out of Hours GP Clinic - Bridge Street Medical Practice - Dr Bob Jones
Consultation
01 Sep 2014 - 02 Sep 2014Admission - Leeds General Infirmary - Consultant - Dr Matt Smith
Medical consultation on hospital inpatient
Patient admitted following fall at home.
Diagnosis: Dislocation of toe joint
Investigation/s: X-ray of foot
Observation/s: Blood pressure - Systolic blood pressure 165mmHg Diastolic blood pressure 70mmHg
Prescription/s: Naproxen 250mg tablet
Procedure/s: Reduction of dislocation of joint of toe
